Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Please don't sneak up on me.<sp:5:0:0> For a
second, I thought my big secret was out.

I'm gonna check out the <clr:0000>mine-cart tracks<clr:ffff>.


Don't follow me!
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>Oooh, I can feel it! I can feel the fun!
It's so close now.

I definitely found <clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff> this time!


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>A super-awesome place just for me!
Loaded with treasure! And I'm the only
one who knows!
Talk23:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0500>But with all these big <clr:0000>rocks having fallen <clr:ffff>on the
tracks, I don't know what to do...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Everyone says it's super fun over here!


And if it's fun, that definitely means
<clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>'s<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>around here.

...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh, hey, guy. You're still here?


<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>That was a close one. He almost overheard that I'm
looking for Gorondia...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh, oh, oh! You probably want a
reward, huh?
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:5000>These are them! The secret tracks. Ummm...<sp:5:1:0> Where
did the cart go?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Humming>Gorondia!<sp:5:0:0> Just you wait—I'm comin'
for ya!
Talk13:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>... The legendary place where Gorons of
old once lived...

Everyone says it's only a legend, but I know it's
gotta be real!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>I mean, the place supposedly has weird vehicles and
technology better than ours.

Somewhere that exciting probably has treasure too.
<sp:5:0:0>I'm gonna find it and then not tell anyone.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But the tracks are all blocked up, and I'm sure they
lead to <clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> Huh?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk26:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0500>All <clr:0000>those rocks <clr:ffff>on the tracks are really...<sp:5:0:0> Hang on...


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Where'd they go?<sp:5:1:0> They're gone!


<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0800>Did they move on their own somehow?<sp:5:0:0>
Whatever! I can use the tracks now!

Just gotta get this <clr:0000>mine cart <clr:ffff>moving!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk39: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>But...how do I make the cart move?
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh, hey, it's you!<sp:5:0:0> Uh...<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>?
Gorondia who?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Never heard of 'em! Never heard that
<clr:0000>Gorondia <clr:ffff>is actually a place where Gorons
used to live.
Definitely never heard that, and not
looking for it either!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseS>No way would I be looking for a place that
has weird vehicles and exciting treasures.

<sp:3:0:2:0500>And I most certainly didn't find <clr:0000>mine-
cart tracks <clr:ffff>that probably lead to this
legendary place I know nothing about.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>And the tracks definitely don't have
something wrong with them that's keeping
me from looking for the place. Nope!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Agh! You again?<sp:5:0:0> Why would you just
stand there all quiet like that!
Talk27: <sp:3:0:2:0800>The cart's ready?<sp:5:0:0> Then so am I!
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:QuestionAngry>Hey, guy.


Everyone knows that a cart won't move
unless it's on some tracks.

<sp:3:0:2:0200>Can you please put it on the tracks before
I get on board?

<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>My cart is the one with the <clr:0000>cushion <clr:ffff>on it.


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't want any bruises on my tush, so
make sure you've got the right one.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I wanted to give ya something, but your
pouch is full, so I can't.

I wanna give you a large Zonai charge, so
you should make space for it, and then
come back here.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> When did that happen?<sp:0:4:0>How did you know I wanted to use it?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait a sec. This happened last time I saw
you too.<sp:5:0:0> You've got superpowers, don't
you? That's the only way!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, whatever. It's fixed now, so I can
keep going!<sp:5:0:0> Bye!
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:QuestionNormal>Guy.


If you want this large Zonai charge, make
some room in your pouch, and come back.
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:QuestionAngry>I'm going to the super-secret tracks that
lead to <clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>! 

It's my secret—so ya better not follow me!
Talk08: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'll never make it to <clr:0000>Gorondia <clr:ffff>at this rate...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?<sp:5:0:0> Something wrong?<sp:5:0:0> Guess I'll get
out, then...
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want to go to <clr:0000>that side <clr:ffff>of the mine-
cart tracks.

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Gorondia has gotta be over there. I can feel it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:QuestionNormal>You finally made space, huh?


Then I can finally reward ya.
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>That was close... I'm glad I didn't get hurt
before making it to Gorondia.
